title: Episode 48 - Cocaine Mitch Gets Ruthless
description:
The fellas get you caught up on hacketology, the immigration crisis, and the Corrupt Politicians Act, followed by an interview with Republican Senate Leader Mitch McConnell. 

Episode sponsored by Heritage Action: Learn more about their "Save Our Elections" project here.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Comfortably Smug, Josh Holmes, Michael Duncan, Mitch McConnell)
